topics.author: 31bee2686368722a0df23600

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5334fa7663687273c3790000#post_5334fa7663687273c3790000

"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5334fabe6368721f7b0b0100#post_5334fabe6368721f7b0b0100
Unlike you two I have tremendous respect and admiration for animals that can do things that could be described as superpowers. You want super strength? Try and ant or a Goliath beetle, who can lift dozens of times their own weight, if a human had that strength they could pick up a city bus! Super speed? Well sure there is the cheetah but there are bugs out there so fast they can run about a 2 feet per second. While that may not see like much keep in mind the bug is only a few millimeters long. That's the equivalent of a human running the 100 meter dash in about 2 seconds. Super sight? The Golden Eagle can read a newspaper from 1000 feet away. The wetta goes into cryogenic hibernation where it's entire body freezes solid and then thaws and it comes right back to life. And then there's the Water Bear. It's basically invincible. Look it up.
topics.author: 5010fa077f123b1e4f00104e

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5334ff8363687213abb40000#post_5334ff8363687213abb40000
I need to be around the outdoors, it's part of who I am. I have been venturing off into the wilderness alone since I was 11. and I don't mean a few hundred feet from home, I mean several miles from any kind of civilization and spending the night there. Catching fish and eating them for dinner. It's paradise for me.

topics.body: Protip: if you need to catch a fish fast because you are hungry, use the dying minnow trick. Basically make the lure twitch very erratically imitating an injured fish. Any fish in the area will be interested as they see it as an easy meal because it can't swim away. They will bite even if they are not hungry.
topics.author: 5010fa077f123b1e4f00104e

topics.body:
Well I'm scratching my head right now; you know that feeling of when you know you forgot something important and you can't remember what it was?  Normally I just use a pen and a paper to mark when I remember something important I forgot so that I can just go back and go, "oh hey now I remember", well now I'm puzzled.  I have two notes I don't even remember making.  I know it has to be something important that I'm forgetting, but I can't remember what it is that I forgot; I forgot that I forgot.

This is going to bug me all night cause I know it was something important, but I can't remember that I forgot that I forgot.  It's just a giant friggin blank spot.


Me right now:
!http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20131017011200/harrypotter/images/8/8b/Nevillelongbottom.png!
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5336096f636872124cbd0000#post_5336096f636872124cbd0000
That would be freaky if there was a reason why everyone occasionally has moments they can't remember and can't even remember they forgot they forgot.

"Hey Bob, I didn't see you today during lunch.  Where were you?"
"Uhhh I don't remember"
"That was ten minutes ago though"
